title: Period of mass oscillating on spring on Mars

content.question: A mass M suspended by a spring with force constant k has a period T when set into oscillation on Earth. Its period on Mars, whose mass is about <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>9</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37E0@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and radius <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37D9@</annotation> </semantics> </math> that of Earth, is most nearly

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
